search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for CallFire (callfire.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for CallFire can be found at this URL: [https://www.callfire.com/pricing](https://www.callfire.com/pricing)【3:0†source】【3:6†source】.

citations.title: Pricing on Call Tracking, SMS Text Messaging, IVR & More - CallFire

Looking for higher volume? Call us at **877.897.3473** for a quote.

### All Plans Include

*   Unlimited Contacts
*   Text-to-Speech Support
*   Record inbound calls for free

*   Simple "Do Not Call" list setup
*   6am - 5pm PT Customer Support
*   Extensive real-time reporting

Pricing FAQs
------------

### [How much do I pay per contact?](https://www.callfire.com/pricing-plans#)

CallFire allows unlimited contacts. You can add as many contacts as you like. CallFire will never charge you a per contact fee.

### [How are calls billed?](https://www.callfire.com/pricing-plans#)

All calls are billed in sixty-second increments, from pickup to hang-up. We bill the length of the call, and not the length of the message that you are sending. This means, for example, that messages left with answering machines will last longer than calls that are answered live. The per-minute cost of the call will depend on the billing plan that you choose.

### [What happens if I call over my plan allowance?](https://www.callfire.com/pricing-plans#)

If your allowance reaches 0 credits, your calls and texts will stop. You can upgrade your plan to resume calling, or purchase additional credits at 5¢ per credit.

### [Can I upgrade my plan?](https://www.callfire.com/pricing-plans#)

Of course! When you select a plan upgrade from our basic pay-as-you-go level, the new plan will take effect immediately. If your account is already on a monthly plan, the new rates will take effect at the beginning of your next billing period. In the interim you can still purchase additional credits at your current plan rate.

### [Can I downgrade my plan?](https://www.callfire.com/pricing-plans#)

If you choose to downgrade your plan, it will take effect at the start of the next billing cycle. Until then, you will continue to be billed at your current plan rate.

### [Does my allowance of minutes expire?](https://www.callfire.com/pricing-plans#)

Yes. The allowance of minutes you purchase each cycle will expire at the end of the cycle.

### [Does my plan include international calls and texting?](https://www.callfire.com/pricing-plans#)

Your plan includes calls to the US and Canada. Our legacy platform supports international dialing. For international rates, view our [international pricing](https://www.callfire.com/products/international) page for more information. CallFire does not currently support international text messages.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: CallFire offers subscription plans with fixed allowances and a pay-as-you-go option. Additional credits can be purchased if allowances are exceeded.
